title: Swearing in item pages

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Hello LoL Boards,

Recently I have been creating item pages for champions when I realised certain in game item names are disabled as they contain inappropriate wording.

This is happening to in items such as:
Sorcerer's Shoes, Mercury's Treads, Mercurial Scimitar, Zhonya's Hourglass and Titanic Hydra ect.

There already is an option to allow swearing in the game chat so limiting these item names is silly to me as I am not intentionally calling my items the F word.

Either allowing the words shoes, hourglass and (mercury??) in Item set's item blocks or an option to allow swearing in this would be appreciated.

I know swearing/toxicity is an issue in this game but I think this is overkill and I just want to write sorcerer's shoes not boots because that's not what they're called!

Any help would be very kind and thank you

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Yeah that seems a bit weird, but it looks like that might be a bug with the system.

I haven't seen any other players mentioning this issue yet, but send this over to the [bug boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) and our QA team can take a closer look at what's going on with it.
